text: @realDonaldTrump Who's they? GOP and the tRump campaign? I would agree. Removing polling places in republican states. Asking people to travel to more locations and come in close contact in COVID19 times to reduce voting. And then deny people the right to vote by mail. #tRumpVoterSuppression
